INSERT INTO goods( name , price , amount , discountamount , discountrate , deliveryfee , sellid , image , detail , product_code , insertion_date ) VALUES
( #{Goods.name} AS name , #{Goods.price} AS price , NULL , NULL , NULL , #{Goods.deliveryfee} AS deliveryfee , #{Goods.sellid} AS sellid , #{Goods.image} AS image , #{Goods.detail} AS detail , #{Goods.product_code} AS product_code , #{Goods.insertion_date} AS insertion_date )
